alpacaInvoice.title: Alpaca Invoice
alpacaInvoice.description: Privacy-preserving B2B invoice system on Aleo blockchain. Leveraging ZK proofs for private records with public anchors, enabling selective chain-verifiable audits, two-step secure payments, and encrypted local persistence via IndexedDB.

meiTranslate.title: MeiTrans - AI Web Translator
meiTranslate.description: A Chrome extension for intelligent translation powered by 8 AI providers (OpenAI, Claude, DeepSeek, Gemini, etc.). Features dual translation, full-page & PDF translation, TTS, smart caching, and a Cloudflare Workers backend.

job1.description: Building AI-powered full stack applications from the ground up, covering frontend architecture, backend services, and AI/LLM integration.

job2.description: Developed and maintained large-scale web applications using React and Next.js, built high-performance UI components, and collaborated with cross-functional teams on product delivery.
